Nashville-Davidson.Watkins College of Art, Design & Film:
Watkins College of Art, Design & Film is a four-year art and design college located in Nashville, Tennessee.
Watkins College offers Bachelor of Fine Arts (BFA) degrees in film, graphic design, interior design, fine arts, and photography as well as post-graduate certificates in film and graphic design. As of 2005, about 400 students were enrolled, mostly full-time.
